assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: KTB, AMO, KL, SSA, HLR, DK, KF, CN, ML, CF, CCM, RJHS, and JS worked for pay-for-service diagnostic laboratories providing genetic testing. All other authors declare no competing interests.

title: A synonymous variant in MYO15A enriched in the Ashkenazi Jewish population causes autosomal recessive hearing loss due to abnormal splicing
